summary: The customer had a question about a charge on their bill labeled "product other." The customer service agent explained that this was an additional service fee that gave customers access to exclusive discounts and early access to new products and services. The customer was informed that this fee was a one-time charge and not something they would be billed for every month. The customer service agent also suggested that the customer review their bill carefully each month to make sure they understand all of the charges and fees associated with their account.
